BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_EMP_DISCIPLINE_ACTION_DTL (STR_EMP_NUMBER, GNUM_SLNO_MAIN, STR_CHARGS_ORD_NO, DT_CHARGS_ORD_DATE, STR_CHARGS_ORD_ISSUE, STR_REMARKS_CHARG, STR_EVENT_DETAILS, STR_DECISION, NUM_PENALTY_ID, STR_PEN_DESCRIPTION, NUM_PENALTY_AMOUNT, STR_DEDUCT_FRM_SALERY, NUM_PENALTY_YEAR, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM PIST_DOC_REL_SER_BOOK_DTL A WHERE A.STR_EMP_NUMBER=? AND A.NUM_SL_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_DOC_REL_SER_BOOK_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_EMP_NUMBER =? AND A.NUM_SL_NO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
